mapper.select: select count(case when p_number between 81 and 82 then 1 end)"오토", count(case when p_number between 83 and 86 then 1 end)"글램핑", count(case when p_number between 87 and 88 then 1 end)"차박" from reservation_tbl

SELECT NVL(저저번달, 0)AS 저저번달, NVL(저번달, 0)AS 저번달, NVL(이번달, 0)AS 이번달 FROM (SELECT sum(case when to_char(r_upddate, 'mm') = to_char(sysdate, 'mm')-2 then r_price / 10 end)AS 저저번달, sum(case when to_char(r_upddate, 'mm') = to_char(sysdate, 'mm')-1 then r_price / 10 end)AS 저번달, sum(case when to_char(r_upddate, 'mm') = to_char(sysdate, 'mm') then r_price / 10 end)AS 이번달 FROM reservation_tbl WHERE r_state = '확정')

select count(case when r_cancel = '개인사유' then 1 end)"개인사유", count(case when r_cancel = '예약날짜변경' then 1 end)"예약날짜변경", count(case when r_cancel = '천재지변' then 1 end)"천재지변", count(case when r_cancel = '기타' then 1 end)"기타" from reservation_tbl where r_state = '취소'
